title: Organization Contribution
description: A specific contribution by an organization to either a GOOS Mission or a WIGOS Program, playing a defined role.

hasTargetProgram.description: The WIGOS Program to which the organization contributes.

hasTargetMission.description: The GOOS Mission to which the organization contributes.

hasOrganizationRole.description: The role played by the organization in the contribution.

contributionDescription.description: Optional free-text description of the contribution.

contributionEndDate.description: The date the contribution ended, if applicable.
